metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1611 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.Description:
A use-after-free flaw was found in btrfs_search_slot in fs/btrfs/ctree.c inbtrfs in the Linux Kernel.This flaw allows an attacker to crash the systemand possibly cause a kernel information lea

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-1611` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.3.0-7-generic - 6.3.0-7.7
linux-image-6.3.0-7-generic-lpae - 6.3.0-7.7
linux-image-unsigned-6.3.0-7-generic - 6.3.0-7.7
linux-image-unsigned-6.3.0-7-generic-64k - 6.3.0-7.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.3.0-7-lowlatency - 6.3.0-7.7.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.3.0-7-lowlatency-64k - 6.3.0-7.7.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.3.0-7.7').
linux-aws package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-azure package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-gcp package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-ibm package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-lowlatency package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.3.0-7.7.1').
linux-oracle package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-raspi package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-starfive package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
